    // Get the value of the input variable (assuming the input variable is named 'myInput')
    var nameInput = inputs.name;
    var phoneNumberInput = inputs.phoneNumber;
    var gcxEntityInput = inputs.gcxEntity;
    var gcxRegionInput = inputs.gcxRegion;


    // Set the request body using the input variable value
    var reqBody = '{"name": "' + nameInput + '","phoneNumber": "' + phoneNumberInput + '","gcxEntity": "' + gcxEntityInput + '","gcxRegion": "' + gcxRegionInput + '"}';
    gs.log("reqBody  :  "+ reqBody );
    // Corrected the line below to set the request body on the RESTMessageV2 instance
    r.setRequestBody(reqBody);

    // Execute the REST message
    var response = r.execute();
    var responseBody = response.getBody();
    var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
    //outputs.reqbody = reqBody;
    outputs.responsebody = responseBody;
  } catch(ex) {
    var message = ex.message;
  }


})(inputs, outputs);
